meanings.definition: Acting with excessive speed or urgency.
meanings.sent1: The hastier rabbit quickly hopped away from the approaching fox.
meanings.sent2: She made a hastier decision than usual, not considering all the consequences.
meanings.sent3: The hastier squirrel forgot where it buried its nuts, causing chaos in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His hastier actions led to a series of unfortunate events.
meanings.sent5: The hastier pace of the city was overwhelming for the small-town visitor.

meanings.sent1: The hastier car zoomed past us on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The hastier response to the emergency saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: The hastier delivery of the pizza surprised the hungry customers.
meanings.sent4: Her hastier heartbeat matched the rhythm of the intense music.
meanings.sent5: The hastier winds signaled an approaching storm.
